summary: Contact management app with invite links, QR codes, and username search functionality for adding contacts without manual entry
architectural_notes: Platform does not support direct device contact access
No real-time messaging features available on platform
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly contact icon illustration with warm earth tones showing two people connecting (contacts-hero.dim_400x300.png)
- QR code placeholder icon in terracotta color (qr-placeholder.dim_128x128.png)
- Search icon in sage green color (search-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a username search interface that allows users to find and add contacts by entering usernames
Build an invite link sharing interface where users can generate and copy their personal invite link
Implement QR code generation for user profiles that encode invite information
Create a QR code scanner interface that allows users to scan QR codes from other users to add them as contacts
Build a contacts list view that displays all saved contacts with their usernames and profile information

Design a clean, modern interface with a cohesive visual theme featuring warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream), rounded corners, and friendly typography that makes contact management feel approachable and intuitive

new_feature_requests.summary: Add contacts via QR code scanning
Create a backend user registry that stores user profiles with unique usernames and contact information
Implement backend logic to generate shareable invite links for users to add contacts
Implement backend contact management system that allows users to maintain a personal contact list
